text: Does the shipboard management team possess adequate technical skills?
Does the shipboard management team possess adequate commercial understanding, including dealing with your customers?
Does the shipboard management team provide you with relevant communication in timely and proficient manner?
Is the cargo operation and handling, including intake, satisfactory?
Is the cargo documentation prepared and forwarded to your satisfaction?
Is the speed, consumption and performance as expected?
Is the vessel’s asset value maintained to your expectations?
Is maintenance planned to minimise impact on commercial operations?
Is the visual appearance of the vessel to your satisfaction?
Is the preparation done timely and sufficient?
Is the flow information during dry-docking adequate?
Is the technical and economical reporting after the dry-docking adequate?
Do your problems receive proper attention?
Are problems solved expediently?
Is the Company proactive in identifying potential problem areas?
Are operating costs at an acceptable and competitive level?
Is the budgetting procedure done in timely and satisfactory manner?
Is the actual spending maintained within agreed budget?
Is the AFE (Authorisation for Expenditure) procedure adhered to?
Do you receive agreed reports timely?
Do the reports provide you with sufficient detailed breakdown of costs?
Do the reports provide you with sufficient explanations to developments?
Do you feel the Company services are overall satisfactory?
Do you feel that the Company is generating value for money?
Do you trust the Company’s ability as a ship manager?
